keyMoments.title: Bliking Pirates Land at Bighorn
keyMoments.description: Wapol and his crew arrive at Bighorn on Drum Island, intending to reclaim the kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the conflict between Wapol's forces and the people of Drum Island.

jollyRoger: A skull with Wapol's distinctive jaw and crown

statusHistory.reason: Crew formed after Wapol was driven from Drum Island by Blackbeard

description: The pirate crew formed by the former King Wapol after he was driven from Drum Island by Blackbeard. The crew consists of former royal advisors and servants, including Chess, Kuromarimo, and the elite Isshi-20 doctors.
objectives: Restore Wapol to his position as king
